creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund and Gift of funds from Arts Midwest
description: Assemblage of found objects (wooden, plastic, metallic, glass) painted with various media in polychrome, ornamented with glass beads, wire, and other materials. A female figure carrying bananas atop her head is surrounded by birds, snakes, flowers, fruits and abstract elements.
dimension: 46 x 44 x 22 in. (116.8 x 111.8 x 55.9 cm) [irregular]
medium: Found objects (wooden, plastic, metallic, glass) painted with various media in polychrome, ornamented with glass beads, wire, and other materials
title: Jan's Snakes
